channel.title: [Delta] help with some item related things! **HELWP ME**
channel.description:
ok, first off, dont leave without a comment!
[b]Server Base:[/b] Ddsspeced v2 *coded*
[b]Problem:[/b] Cant find out how to make u keep items on death, with skull, cause you lose firecape, and i wanna make it so donators dont lose their dlcaws, vesta, pl8, and items!
help!!!! please!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! somone!!!!!!!!!!!!! your hot!!!!!!!!! if u help!!!!
[size=20pt]dont forget to comment even if u dont know how!!![/size][br][br][size=1]Posted on: June 30, 2009, 10:50:42 am[/size][hr]or contack my on MSN: jessewillbend4me@hotmail.com
